dataSet.quotation: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
dataSet.author: Japanese Proverb

dataSet.quotation: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
dataSet.author: Robert Schuller

dataSet.quotation: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
dataSet.author: Robert Schuller

dataSet.quotation: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
dataSet.author: William James

dataSet.quotation: It doesn't matter how slow you go, as long as you don't stop.
dataSet.author: Confucius

dataSet.quotation: The best way to predict the future, is to create it.
dataSet.author: Abraham Lincoln

dataSet.quotation: In the middle of a difficulty lies opportunity.
dataSet.author: Albert Einstein
